resources.string:
Hi my name is Fatih. 

I love fish 

The kind that alive and swims around in a aquarium or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also a river. 

 I like eating fish too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Poached fish - not so much. 
And sometimes 覺 even go fishing 
And even less sometimes 覺 actually catch something. 
I'll be happy ask someone else about fishing, thought.
